pr_title: Remove dynamic filters from spatial joins

timeline.message:
Remove dynamic filters from spatial join

Dynamic filters that use symbols from
left and right sources will land in
SpatialJoinNode#filter.
Therefore they need to be removed.

timeline.author: martint

timeline.bodyText: Ah, I see you undid the change in the first commit. Please squash this one in there.
timeline.author: martint
